title: World Leaders Consider Ways To Slow Climate Change
teaser: Heads of state from well over 100 countries came to New York City this week to find ways to slow climate change. Tuesday began with speechmaking at the United Nations, and then diplomats spent the afternoon proposing practical solutions. The summit is a dry run for a meeting next year to draft a new treaty on global warming.
